channel.title: Head problemo

item.title: Head problemo
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

case 400: // the gods battle (q5) start point sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126("Hello there adventurer!", 4904); sendFrame126("Care to do a task for me?", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

The player’s heads move while talking…Yet the npcs do not? Am I missing something…?

EDIT: Some of the heads move…Like this one:

case 1339: /* Hans*/ sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Welcome To Retribution!", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Read full topic
